original_text: As they moved, they would go in any one of the four directions the creatures faced; the wheels did not change direction as the creatures went.
korean_text: 그들이 갈 때에는 사방으로 향한 대로 돌이키지 아니하고 가며

sentences.original_text: they would go in any one of the four directions
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 네 방향 중 어느 한쪽으로 갈 것이며

sentences.original_text: the wheels did not change direction
